Aetheris.name: Aetheris
Aetheris.description: Aetheris are humanoids who possess radiant auras and glowing eyes. They are descendants of celestials from the Hallows Above.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

Divine Countenance.name: Divine Countenance
Divine Countenance.description: You have advantage on rolls to command or persuade.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.description: Spend 2 Hope to grant a +1 bonus to either your or an ally's Evasion until you next take Severe damage or you use Eye of the Storm again.

Fireproof.name: Fireproof
Fireproof.description: You are immune to damage from magical or mundane flame.

Gale Force.name: Gale Force
Gale Force.description: Mark a Stress to conjure a gust of wind that carries you or an ally up to Very Far range. Additionally, you can always control the speed at which you fall.

Gnome.name: Gnome
Gnome.description: Gnomes are small humanoids most easily recognized by their dense musculature, long arms, and large facial features.

Hallowed Aura.name: Hallowed Aura
Hallowed Aura.description: Once per rest, when an ally within Close range rolls with Fear, you can make it a roll with Hope instead.

Ignition.name: Ignition
Ignition.description: Mark a Stress to wreathe your primary weapon in flame until the end of the scene. While ablaze, it gives off a bright light and grants a 1d6 bonus to damage rolls against targets within melee range.

Immoveable.name: Immoveable
Immoveable.description: While your feet are touching the ground, you cannot be lifted or moved against your will.

Lifespring.name: Lifespring
Lifespring.description: Once per rest, when you have access to a small amount of water, you can mark 2 Stress to heal a Hit Point on yourself or an ally.

Low-Light Living.name: Low-Light Living
Low-Light Living.description: When youâ€™re in an area with low light or heavy shadow, you have advantage on rolls to hide, investigate, or perceive details within that area.

Magical Sense.name: Magical Sense
Magical Sense.description: You can sense the presence of magical creatures. You have advantage on rolls to track or locate creatures with magical ability.

Nimble Fingers.name: Nimble Fingers
Nimble Fingers.description: When you make a Finesse Roll, you can spend 2 Hope to reroll your Hope Die.

oeDdOJHLKQf7vjPb.name: Nimble Fingers
oeDdOJHLKQf7vjPb.description: When you make a Finesse Roll, you can spend 2 Hope to reroll your Hope Die.

Stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin.description: Gain a +1 bonus to your armor score and Damage Thresholds.
